game.name: LANDLORD
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Landlord Chess" turns the ever-changing strategies in card games into visual scenarios, makes it more like playing chess or Sudoku. It includes a single-player mode and a multiplayer online mode, while also integrating a leaderboard and an achievement system.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Landlord Chess" turns the ever-changing strategies in card games into visual scenarios, makes it more like playing chess or Sudoku. It includes a single-player mode and a multiplayer online mode, while also integrating a leaderboard and an achievement system.
